title: My Boyfriend Wants Me Back
description:
Lizette broke up with her shack-up honey for several reasons, and now he's trying to convince her to come back. - Dr. Laura: "Once you've made a wise decision, be strong enough to stick with it."

Have you ever gone back to an ex? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:

Facebook.com/DrLaura

Instagram.com/DrLauraProgram
